# Description

I am a PhD candidate at Erasmus School of Law (ESL). My research focuses on the quantitative analysis of law and explores whether and how platforms are able to implement and foster the goals of privacy regulation.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Julia Kr채mer"
special_skill <- c("R", "python", "webscraping", "law")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c(all_of(special_skill), "open source software", "reproducible analysis", "data management", "open access", "data sharing", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)
```
